patterns: What kinds of services are there?
What is the profile of the webpage?
responses: We offer an online platform for searching dental clinics and booking appointments in them
We can help you in searching and booking appointments for dental clinics
We currently do not have any service that requires any payment, but in the future we will accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
There is nothing you have to pay for
Our services are free for all

patterns: How can I search for any clinic?
responses: You have to log in first to search for clinics with the Search Clinic button or dentists with the Search Dentist button
After you logged in you can search for dentists and clinics with adequate buttons

patterns: How can I book an appointment?
responses: After you have logged in you have to click on the card that is representing the clinic or dentist to load information about the clinic, and to book appointment
To book appointment you have to log in and select the card that is representing the clinic or dentist

patterns: How can I delete my profile ?
responses: To delete your profile click on the Profile button which will appear if you move your cursor on displayed email address
You can delete your profile by hovering your mouse on your email address, click on the Profile button and push Delete Account

patterns: How can I delete an appointment?
responses: You can manage your appointments by clicking on the Appointments button, if a clinic registers any change in their availability the connected appointments will be automatically managed and we will send a notification about it for you
To manage booked appointments click on the Appointments button, on clinic related changes the affected customers will get a notification and the appointments will be automatically managed by us
Only registered Dentists can create and manage clinics after they have logged in
You have to register as a Dentist to manage clinics
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
Parallel lines have so much in common. It's a shame they'll never meet.
Did you hear about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers? He'll stop at nothing to avoid them.
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
I used to play piano by ear, but now I use my hands.
